long_description: The REI Mesh Storage Bag lets you store your sleeping bag uncompressed, while also allowing the bag to air out. The insulating ability of you sleeping bag's fill will last longer if the bag is stored uncompressed. By airing it out, this storage bag also helps your sleeping bag's fill to remain free of mildew. Experts recommend against storing a sleeping bag inside its stuff sack because long periods of compression degrade the fill and don't allow the fill to dry fully. The REI Mesh Storage Bag offers a smart and convenient way to store your sleeping bag between trips.
short_description: The REI Mesh Storage Bag lets you store your sleeping bag uncompressed, while also allowing the bag to air out.
